participant_1.background:
I sometimes struggle to find clothes that fit my body type.
i had one step dad , and fortunately he ignored me.
I've been single for a while now, but I'm looking forward to finding someone to share my life with.
I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

participant_2.background:
I like to make clothes and my spouse works in the music industry.
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
i like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn.
I don't own a car because I value my time and prefer to take public transportation or walk to restaurants.
i wear cardigans because i hope it makes me look more cultured.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm a single mom, and I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop.
That's awesome! I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
That sounds great! I hope you're able to achieve your dream of opening a restaurant.
Thank you! I'm doing my best to save up and make it a reality.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great success.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like watching action adventure movies and eating popcorn. I also like making clothes and taking public transportation.
That sounds fun! I like watching action adventure movies too. I also like to read and go for walks.
Oh, I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series, the Hunger Games series, and the Percy Jackson series.
Oh, I love the Harry Potter series too! I've read all of the books and seen all of the movies.
Me too! I'm a huge fan of Harry Potter.
Me too! I'm glad to meet someone who is also a fan.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
